extendedInfo.description: When you're working in the heat, safety comes first. With the OSHA Heat Safety Tool, you have vital safety information available whenever and wherever you need it â right on your mobile phone.The App allows workers and supervisors to calculate the heat index for their worksite, and, based on the heat index, displays a risk level to outdoor workers. Then, with a simple tap, you can get reminders about the protective measures that should be taken at that risk level to protect workers from heat-related illnessâreminders about drinking enough fluids, scheduling rest breaks, planning for and knowing what to do in an emergency, adjusting work operations, gradually building up the workload for new workers, training on heat illness signs and symptoms, and monitoring each other for signs and symptoms of heat-related illness. Stay informed and safe in the heat, check your risk level.For more information about safety while working in the heat, see OSHAâs heat illness webpage, including new online guidance about using the heat index to protect workers.

reviews.title: Samsung S4
reviews.comment: Cool app. Gave critical info that I can share with my friends. Great health info and user friendly.
reviews.author: Marsha HT

reviews.title: Needs to update more often
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app but the temperature needs to update more than once an hour. With my job, I need to monitor the temperature frequently
reviews.author: Stephanie Utka

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Slow and keeps freezing. Completely useless even when it does work. Waste of my tax dollars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blows
reviews.comment: This app does nothing more for me then what I can get from my local weather station. Also the temp always says its 10 degrees hotter then what the actual temp, plus I know when its hot without looking at the app, telling me its hot, and i need to drink lots of water, DUH!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: The app is good - accurate with the correct numbers.  As for the sit behind the desk staple drivers whining about taxes: get a real job, vote, voice to your elected officials, run for office, provide usable feedback, or shut up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good info to have
reviews.comment: The heat index is good to have, although it is unclear at what location or how close the measurments are taken.  The heat injury symptom info is very good and is reason enough to have to app, IMO.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Like its from osha and free. Always nice to know heat index
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little App
reviews.comment: Obviously for summer months. Great calc of heat index, not just heat. Like the reminders of precautions to take based on the threat level. Like it is from OSHA, no bloat or ads.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Location
reviews.comment: Can NEVER find my location but does work if I enter temp & humidity
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This is a sweet little app that gives you critical info.  If you live in a humid climate this app is amazing. Thanks OSHA!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you
reviews.comment: Thank you for this app. Now I can be informed and help inform others
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Temperature
reviews.comment: Can you sent an upgrade where you can use Centigrades also?  Thank you
reviews.author: Azriah Palm

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.comment: A heat index app in February. Give me a call when you start working on one for wind chill. Six figures? Ever played bubble ball
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.comment: Thank you for sharing it with free.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool
reviews.comment: Great for my husband(roughneck), great for me(very heat sensitive).
reviews.author: ashlee bayer

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: well
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: %100  waste
reviews.comment: Any programmer could make this app for $1000 or less. The federal government spent $200000.  It doesn\'t even work well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A very nice app.
reviews.comment: Hope government can provide such easy use app with great health info!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Do we really need an app to tell us 100 degrees is hot?  Waste of tax later money.
reviews.author: A Google User
